Claim: "Two men are making pancakes in their swimtrunks."
Implication: "There is one man with light blue jeans on and one with dark blue jeans on that are walking down the street."
Referring expressions: Two men, pancakes, swimtrunks  One man, light blue jeans, dark blue jeans
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (AreMaking(a,b) and AreInSwimtrunks(c))))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists d ((IsWalkingDownTheStreet(d) and IsInLightBlueJeans(e)) or (IsWalkingDownTheStreet(d) and IsInDarkBlueJeans(f))))))
